trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un insieme di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: La classe DataGridViewImageColumn è un tipo specializzato del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizzata per contenere logicamente celle che consentono di visualizzare immagini.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewImageColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Un DataGridViewImageColumn ha un associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>in ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>che interseca tale</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ogni cella è in grado di contenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Image>o <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, a seconda del valore del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: Visualizzazione di icone è utile per l'inserimento di immagini con trasparenza.

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, le celle vuote visualizzano un'immagine di errore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Per impedire la visualizzazione dei valori della cella uguale a questa immagine di `null` o <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà dell'oggetto di stile di cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà `null` prima di aggiungere righe al controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione non influenza la riga per nuovi record, tuttavia.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Per impedire l'icona di errore nella riga per i nuovi record quando il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>valore della proprietà è `true`, è inoltre necessario impostare in modo esplicito il valore della cella su `null` in un gestore per il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>evento o la colonna set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà a un'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-tipo con un override derivato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>proprietà che restituisce `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di ordinamento predefinito per questo tipo di colonna è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> (classe), configurarlo per l'utilizzo con i valori delle celle di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore chiama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>con un `valuesAreIcons` valore del parametro di `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> (classe), la configurazione facoltativa per l'utilizzo con <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> i valori delle celle.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza la colonna impostando le proprietà seguenti.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Valore | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| Un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>con la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>inizializzata per la `valuesAreIcons` valore del parametro. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>| Il valore di `valuesAreIcons` parametro. | | La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | Immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>Se `valuesAreIcons` è `true` e digitare <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>Se `valuesAreIcons` è `false`. | Per garantire che il canale alfa di <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>i valori delle celle viene disegnato in modo corretto, utilizzare questo costruttore con un `valuesAreIcons` valore del parametro di `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che imposterà la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>di celle in questa colonna ai valori di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per indicare che verranno impostati sui valori di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il modello utilizzato per creare nuove celle.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: I costruttori di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>classe inizializzare questa proprietà su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> appena creato</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > La modifica le proprietà del modello di cella non immediatamente avrà l'interfaccia utente (UI) delle celle della colonna esistente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Queste modifiche saranno visibili solo dopo la rigenerazione della colonna (ad esempio, dell'ordinamento della colonna o tramite una chiamata al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo)).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> al quale sono modellate tutte le altre celle nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di set non è compatibile con tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta di questa colonna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per duplicare una colonna di celle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il duplicato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile di cella predefinito della colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituito da questa proprietà contiene i valori iniziali delle proprietà seguenti: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` proprietà | Il valore predefinito | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| Immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>Se il valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>iniziale è `true`; in caso contrario, un'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>. | Questi valori l'override del valore specificato nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo, ma può essere sottoposto a override da altre proprietà di stile di cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [stili della cella nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Per impedire la visualizzazione per l'immagine di errore standard `null` o <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>i valori delle celle, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per questo oggetto stile di cella `null` o la propria immagine di errore prima di aggiungere righe al controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione non influenza la riga per nuovi record, tuttavia.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Per impedire l'icona di errore nella riga per i nuovi record quando il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>valore della proprietà è `true`, è inoltre necessario impostare in modo esplicito il valore della cella su `null` o la propria immagine di errore in un gestore per il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>evento o la colonna set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà a un'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-tipo con un override derivato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>proprietà che restituisce `null` o la propria immagine di errore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dalla proprietà DefaultCellStyle ha un valore uguale all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, la modifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>valore della proprietà da `true` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>ha un valore uguale all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, la modifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>valore della proprietà da `false` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> da applicare come stile predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una stringa che descrive l'immagine della colonna.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Description property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà Description per descrivere l'immagine fornita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: Questa descrizione fornisce un'alternativa accessibile all'immagine.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il testo della descrizione viene utilizzato quando il valore di cella viene copiato negli Appunti.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: La descrizione testuale dell'immagine della colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'icona visualizzata nelle celle della colonna quando la cella <> </> *> proprietà non è impostato e la cella <> </> *> è impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Icon property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'icona specifica un'icona visualizzata nelle celle senza valori quando la colonna non è associato a dati e la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>proprietà è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Per una colonna con associazione a dati le cui celle non dispone di un'immagine associata, viene visualizzato un simbolo di errore standard.

trans-unit.source: Using the Icon property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando la proprietà dell'icona anziché <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>proprietà garantisce che un canale alfa in un'icona venga disegnato correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera visualizzare un <xref:System.Drawing.Image>anziché un <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>proprietà invece e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the Icon property value.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>proprietà delle singole celle per indicare se la cella viene visualizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>o il valore della proprietà icona.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> da visualizzare.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'immagine visualizzata nelle celle della colonna quando la cella <> </> *> proprietà non è impostato e la cella <> </> *> è impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Image property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà immagine specifica un'immagine che viene visualizzata nelle celle senza valori quando la colonna non è associato a dati e la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>proprietà è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Per una colonna con associazione a dati le cui celle non dispone di un'immagine associata, viene visualizzato un simbolo di errore standard.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera visualizzare un <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>anziché un <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>proprietà invece e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Ciò garantisce che il canale alfa del <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>viene disegnato in modo corretto.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the Image or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>proprietà delle singole celle per indicare se la cella viene visualizzata l'immagine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>valore della proprietà quando è presente alcun valore di cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> da visualizzare.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il layout dell'immagine nelle celle della colonna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> che specifica il layout della cella.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che descrive la colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che descrive la colonna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se visualizzano le celle della colonna <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire che il canale alfa di <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>valori venga disegnato correttamente, impostare questa proprietà su `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà ha un valore uguale all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, modifica il valore di proprietà ValuesAreIcons `true` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>ha un valore uguale all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, modificare il valore di proprietà ValuesAreIcons `false` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>all'immagine di errore standard di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le celle contengono valori di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se le celle contengono valori di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>
